item.title: Spanish Tortilla
item.description: Things like the slicing of the potato, the amount of salt and how curdled is the inner part of the tortilla depend on your own taste. Donâ€™t be afraid to experiment! preptime: 5 min cooktime: 35 minutes servings: 6 Ingredients 8 free-range eggs 1 kg of potatoes 1 white onion Extra virgin olive oil Directions Peel, rinse and dry the potatoes. Cut the potatoes into thin slices. Put in a bowl, add salt to taste and stir.
